contest-event.event-date: Sept. 12, 2010 D Hardraw Scar (Class A) Hardraw Scar (Class A) 10 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar-class-a Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Best March: Hade Edge Best Hymn: Harrogate Best Solo: Durham Miners Association Otley Brass are ungraded, but because of their success over the past few years they competed in Class A. The missing draw numbers are for bands who competed in Class B. March 13, 2010, 6:38 p.m. April 14, 2011, 4:28 p.m. 1 Harrogate Band John North 2 Hade Edge Simon Wood 3 Durham Miners Association Neil Davies 4 Otley Brass Band Gordon Eddison 5 Wetherby and District Silver Alan Seymour
